titlestmt.titleproper: African, Afro-Caribbean, and African American, Native American and Pacific Rim Arts Slide Collection
African, Afro-Caribbean, and African American, Native American and Pacific Rim Arts Slide Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Maria Zapata

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 00:10

did.unittitle: African, Afro-Caribbean, and African American, Native American and Pacific Rim Arts Slide Collection
did.abstract: Collection consists of color and black and white 35 mm slides of the arts of African, Native American, and Pacific Rim cultures, including Australia and New Zealand, as well as Afro-Brazilian, Afro-cuban, Afro-Haitian, Afro-Mexican, Afro-Portuguese, Afro-Surinam, and Afro-American arts.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright has not been transferred to Yale University. Further use of this material may be subject to the copyright laws of the United States (Title 17, United States Code) or to site license or other rights management terms or conditions.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: African, Afro-Caribbean, and African American, Native American and Pacific Rim Arts Slide Collection, Arts Library, Yale University

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of color and black and white 35 mm slides of the arts of African, Native American, and Pacific Rim cultures, including Australia and New Zealand, as well as Afro-Brazilian, Afro-cuban, Afro-Haitian, Afro-Mexican, Afro-Portuguese, Afro-Surinam, and Afro-American arts.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged into four principal sub-collections: Africa, Afro- , Native American and Pacific Rim. Sub-arranged principally by location.
